text: nirnitamaya etanum dinannalil. ninnalarenkilum ‎reagiyea yatrakkaranea anenkil marru ‎divasannalil atrayum ennam tikaykkanam. ere ‎prayasatteate matram neampetukkan kaliyunnavar ‎neampupeksiccal pakaram prayascittamayi ‎oragatikk aharam nalkanam. ennal arenkilum ‎svayam kututal nanma ceytal atavan nallatan. ‎neampetukkalan ninnalkkuttamam. ninnal ‎tiriccariyunnavarenkil. ‎
